website_summaries.verdict: This smaller cage works best as part of a larger, interconnected hamster community. Very affordable as a starter cage for one hamster as well.
pros: Easy access to pet in sleeping "igloo"
cons: Original water bottle is very small
Individual unit not large enough for two hamsters

customer_reviews.title: This cage has a hamster wheel which can trap the ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage has a hamster wheel which can trap the hamsters leg. My daughter found her hamster mangled and bleeding and trying to chew off her own leg trying to free herself. I have photos but I think they are the reason my last review was not approved, as the damage this cage's hamster wheel did to the hamster was indeed gruesome and upsetting. As cute as this cage is, I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: AFV

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My Phil well my son's Syrian hamster loves the loft addition I added! !!! The water bottle leaks bad!!!! Other than that it's great. The price adds up really fast with all the add ons that is the only down fall. What is the object that I circled? What is it's purpose? I mean the cage is really little where can it go. He can't climb it.. Please does anyone know?
customer_reviews.author: Ja'nice

customer_reviews.title: Great Ventilation for my Robo Dwarf
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a robo dwarf and already has the OVO Studio and Cristal Hamster Habitat. (See Picture 1) I bought this to replace the OVO Studio because i felt like there wasn't enough ventilation and it's not the easiest to clean because the latches on the side don't always lock like they should. (!!) This one is great! It's Peanut's new favorite place to hang out and it's very ventilated. (See Picture 2)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous wheel. Your pet will get injured/decapitated.
customer_reviews.text: Why one star. First of all this cage is more like a prison for your hamster it is very small. Second of all the wheel has holes in it, your pet will get badly injured. I duck taped it. I took a picture you might see it. The reason I bought it and keeping it is because my two dwarfes started fighting badly. Even though they have a very large cage. So when one of them starts attacking the other ( usually at night I move it into the small cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy for gerbils that like to chew
customer_reviews.text: The only positive about this cage is how it looks. Love the simple colors- the clear view is great with pops of orange- especially compared to the obnoxiously colored ones from other manufacturers. But, the latch on the cage broke immediately. Our gerbils ate the ladder and a good bit of the loft- maybe ours are more nibbly than others, but having lots of chewable edges is not a good thing. And the water bottle started rapidly leaking so we couldn't keep water in the cage for our gerbils. We ended up using a bowl for a few days until our new, obnoxiously colored cage showed up. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Luradg

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to pets
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous do not buy !!!!! I read the report for another customer about their little hamster almost losing his leg from. Wheel. It was just a fluke but what Happened 2 my pet was worse he actually died and because the way that the cage is designed could not reach into the little habitat area. To. Check. On. Him I just notice he was not moving for a day or 2 the second day he was dead and his poor leg was totally scraped off of. Skin tissue.... all you could see was bone. He must have bled to death!!!! do not buy this product. I already phoned in call them that it was a defect sign of the product
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H

customer_reviews.title: Detailed description
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my one male mouse. Would be ok for 1 hamster. Would be ok for 2 female mice, but too small for 3. Wheel is silent with a drop of olive oil in the gear. Cannot rearrange layout, everything fits one way only. Big door but not big enough to remove wheel. Easy to reach in for cleaning wheel. Latch on door was annoying so I removed it. Door will close securely without it, however. Mouse seems to like it. I worry there might not be enough ventilation in the hidey hole. Overall exactly what I wanted and am pleased with it. Thinking of getting some tubes as this comes without any, but it does have 2 tube ports.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Mills

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mouse, Happy House.
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for our little mouse! Affordable, and I can take it apart and clean it in 5 to 10 minutes by running hot water over the dirty items and its sparkly like new clean! Stylish enough and sanitary enough that Mousie can live on the kitchen counter where we can see him and he can engage with us all the time. Wheel isn't too noisy (remember those old squeaky wheels from your childhood?).
customer_reviews.author: InspectorGirl

customer_reviews.title: Hamster can open the door
customer_reviews.text: We got our hamster 1 week ago. Last night he figured out how to open the latch on the front door. He has gotten out twice. Now today the side piece fell off. We are securing every part of the cage. Before I type any more, I am heading to the pet store to buy a new cage. Do not buy this cage, only lasted a week before we could no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great for a mouse if attached to other cages :)
customer_reviews.text: My mouse was pushing all of his bedding out of the habitrail cristal so I got this one, since it has a deeper bedding pan. He LOVES this cage. I have it attached to multiple other things, and he is very happy. I use a different wheel, because I'm afraid he'll catch his little feet in the gaps in this one. I also used the water bottle from the cristal, I hate the bubble ones what come with hie other habitrail cages. They leak very bad. This is great if you have a mouse that pushes his bedding out, and allows you to make it deeper :)
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Bad door latches
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time Habitrail customer. As in 20+ years. That being said, I'm very disappointed in the Cristal line of cages. They are very similar to the Safari line, just orange and clear instead of green and beige, and the door latches are different. And that's where the big problem is. The latches on these Cristal cages break within a month or so. With the dwarf ham I had it wasn't a big deal, but with the Syrians it caused a problem. I went through about 3 of these cages and had the same problem with each one. I ended up finally switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking small cage, TINY waterbottle and holey wheel
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, small cage for robo hamster. The water bottle is very, very tiny (maybe 2 oz.) so we switched it out with a larger non-orange one that did not look as nice with the cage design. Otherwise you will need to fill the tiny water bottle almost daily, maybe twice a day! We put in a silent solid walled wheel. The wheel it comes with has slits/holes that your hamsters feet and legs would fall through. The sides are not tall enough to hold enough bedding that hamsters like to dig and hide in. This cage is ok because it looks sleek. A little short on functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage!
customer_reviews.text: I have one mouse that lives in this cage. I didn’t expect him to live so originally he was living in an aquarium for a few weeks. When I introduced him to this cage he went CRAZY!! Climbing all over the bars and bouncing around. I truly believes that he loves this cage. The way the cage is made, paper bedding doesn’t get pushed out the sides like I thought they would and believe me, this mouse pushes the bedding all over the place and up against the walls. It is pretty small, but I believe it is the perfect size for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Okay cage
customer_reviews.text: Came with scratches. I connected two of the habitat twist. Don't like how narrow they are. My dwarf hamster was calm in this cage and very sweet. I upgraded her and now she is mean. I think some hamsters like small cages. My Syrian hamster likes her big cage, she didn't like when I had her in this before I got my dwarf hamster. She didn't like the 10 gallon or 20 gallon. She was okay for a month but then became restless. My dwarf hamster is restless in her bigger tank and she was fine in this. Not all hamsters are the same.
customer_reviews.author: kevin miller

customer_reviews.title: Let me be honest.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is cute and I got it delivered with a crack on the side of the cage. But if all of you REALLY want the best for your hamster- this cage is not enough because it is TOO SMALL. Your hamster needs at least 450 square inches of floor space!! So save your money and get a good-sized storage bin! Take it from someone who had 2 hamsters and did not realize they were not so happy since they were biting on the bars and tried to escape numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Ahem

customer_reviews.title: My hamster is an idiot but the cage is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the better cages I've bought in my life. I hate the "aesthetic" of the multi-colored plastic ones. It just makes your buddy harder to see and they usually clash. This one is nice and...chic? Maybe that's a stretch of a word but it's definitely better on the eyes. My hamster is too stupid to use the loft but that's not a cage problem, that's a Chappie problem. I also like how easy it is to clean. Lots of cages require you to basically poop-scoop the bedding out because the bottom doesn't detach. This one does so you can just dump it, wash it off, and put fresh bedding in it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good cage except missing parts and no help.
customer_reviews.text: We have two mice and they always got the bedding on the table around the last wire cage. This one is so helpful with keeping the bedding in the cage. The only problem is that the water bottle didn't come with it but the little piece that holds it did. Neither did the little white ladder. Only the little upper hideout with no way for them to get to it. So we got a better water bottle and quite wheel. I tried to request the missing parts but couldn't get ahold of the manufacturer's threw the link and can only return it threw Amazon. But we want to keep it. Just need the Ladder! A little help Amazon or Habitrail?
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a good affordable cage. However, when putting it together, it is so, so easy to break and then impossible to get back together. The tube covers on the side would not attach to the cage. We had to tape them on. Part of the plastic broke. We taped it together. The wheel, after a week, becomes loud and squeaky. It has started to detach from the wall. My hamster likes to detach it and hide underneath for some reason. We're both introverts, I guess. Anyway, it's not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Michel

customer_reviews.title: Junk - just don’t.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Don’t waste your time waiting for this to arive only to have to return it because it’s broken on so many levels. If I put a hamster in this cage it would get its little paw stuck in one of the many cracks throughout this cage. It’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cage for my 2 baby hamsters, but will need to upgrade as they grow. For the price it is great. I did purchase a kaytee wheel to replace the one it, since other reviews said that it was noisy and hamsters were getting legs stuck in the holes. comes with everything you need and can add tubes to it. I am going to buy a second one and connect it with the tubes. assembly took 5 minutes. it was mostly assembled out of the box just had to add the wheel, second level hide, and water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as I thought
customer_reviews.text: We own two hamsters and two of these cages. They're great! We originally thought the wheel was so loud and that really would have been the only complaint. We even removed it from the first cage and got a saucer. But by accident one night we positioned the wheel differently on the second cage and it was dead silent from then on. Just make sure the tab that holds the wheel to the bar is positioned snug on the bar, then sleep like a baby while your mouse friend gets his energy out.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Magillicutti

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this cage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cage, it comes with everything necessary. I replaced the wheel that came with it with a "silent" wheel because they can get pretty noisy at night. Also, i added a wooden home for him to go in. I have a Syrian Hamster and it's definitely enough space for him, the wheel provides him great exercise. The water bottle and it's holder is super practical. Definitely recommend this cage to everyone. You get so many features for an awesome price!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinar T.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Kaytee habitat of similar design
customer_reviews.text: Came right on time, almost wholly assembled, easy to maintain, nice-looking AND accomodates my plumper than usual hamster, who loves his new home, which also has a larger, more well designed and spacious wheel. The whole design blows the similar models I have previously bought out of the water. Bacon (occupant hamster) and I are very happy with this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D.

customer_reviews.title: small cage, for small rodents
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these cages for gerbils, together, the cages are enough room for a gerbil, I wouldn't use just one cage as it isn't big enough. It's a nice cage, easy to open and close, and we haven't had any escapes (and doubt we will). The water bottle sucks, throw it away and get a real bottle. You will also need a food dish, and probably a housing structure as this cage doesn't come with either of those. The wheel is loud AF, so plan on replacing that too.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing home for my hamsters and amazing for adding on to!
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters love it and pretty much came fully installed i just had to pop on the wheel, the ladder, and fill the and pop in place the water bottle. I love how you can see the critters clearly as well! The wheel isn't loud either. If the hamster runs super fast it squeaks a little but not too loud. Definitely would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Dwarf Hammy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just got it for Boo my winter dwarf and it's a great size. The wheel is super noisy and takes up a lot of space so I replaced it with a smaller one. I really like the plasticky material because it's easier for me to see what she is up to and take pictures. She has yet to explore the upper area but it's nice and roomy for a dwarf.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: WHEELE WAS BROKEN CAGE BOTTOM FALLS OUT!MISSING DISH AND WATER BOTTLE LEAKS.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cages The cages are beautiful but be ready to invest in a QUIET WHEEL. The wheele I received with the product was broken and it makes SO MUCH noise. After i super glued it together it was quiet. Water BOTTLE LEAKS LIKE CRAZY DONT USE IT.ALSO I JUST OPENED THE SECOND BOX AS I ORDERED 2 CAGES AND FIND OUT THAT ONLY 1 CAME WITH FOOD DISH! I AM SO ANGRY.It is a beautiful cage FOR PRICE but THE BOTTOM OF THE CAGE FALLS OFFF EVERYTIME YOU PICK IT UP.needs some type of adhesive to hold the plastic together. Also NEW WATER BOTTLE.
customer_reviews.author: Undooooo

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 star but it arrived with broken plastic
customer_reviews.text: Neat setup aside from the fact that it came out of the box new with cracks near the tunnel attachment spaces. Looks somewhat easy to clean, chewproof for a while but we just need it for travel from home to play house in the backyard and easy to assemble. If only it wasn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jwho

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's "escape proof"
customer_reviews.text: This cage is just fine as an add on cage. It comes with everything you need for your first pet's home. It's alright size for a dwarf hamster, but get another cage and attach it if you get a gerbil or rat or anything else. The lid doesn't seem especially secure, if my gerbils were more prone to escapism, I'd worry. It probably won't hold a naughty hamster or smart rat. if they push hard enough, they will get the door open.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best quality you’ll het for the price
customer_reviews.text: I usually only write a review if I’m impressed and I most definitely am in this case. Took all of 2 min to assemble. The high plastic walls keep the bedding from making a mess. I mean NO MESS. Bought this for my sons small mouse and the little guy loves it. I’d give it a 10 star if I could. Beautiful product. Priced perfectly. Got here very quickly, and with no damage. Would recommend buying all day.
customer_reviews.author: Balor

customer_reviews.title: Good size for Robo Dwarf
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage. Its small, but works well for a robo dwarf hamster. It comes put together right in the box making it easy to set up. the bottle doesnt leak, the wheel isn't too loud, and I love that you can see through the clear plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good EXCEPT the wheel
customer_reviews.text: I am overall happy with this habitat. My only big criticism is the WHEEL (see below) PROS - Great price for what you get - EASY to clean, can just remove the bottom tray from the rest of the habitat to change out the shavings easily - Water bottle is chew proof - Really like the little ladder leading up to the deck where my hamster usually sleeps, so that I can watch him sleep (creepy, I know!) CONS - the hamster wheel is unacceptable!! It has a pretty big gap along the center, which I can imagine my hamster easily getting his leg trapped and breaking it (see photo). Once I replace the wheel, this habitat is all good.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Sio

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a very good little cage. Probably too small for two mice, but perfect for a single smallish critter. I love the clean up of this cage. The huge door opening top is fabulous! The food house thingy is odd and not useful, but I just took it out and didn't use it. Only slightly downside is the water situation which tends to collect water on the bottom of the tube, which is a slight pain to take off and clean every time. All in all one of my favorite cages for its purpose yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: We initially had the habitrail ovo round houses and honestly they were cool to look at but so darn inpractical. You couldn't have a water bottle that hung, you couldn't have a standing water bottle. Just all around flawed. But we found these and they connect to our ovo tubes and honestly way bigger and amazing for our hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: This set up is great. I love how it has a little loft ...
customer_reviews.text: This set up is great. I love how it has a little loft for bedtime. We didn't need to but we purchased the tubes and it makes it the ultimate play area! Hamster loves it! (Not recommended for Dwarf Robo hampsters, we have to angle it back so the little guy can crwal up... but it still works).
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage- some parts not being used
customer_reviews.text: The size of the cage itself is perfect for our one mouse. But the wheel is for much bigger rodent pets, which I think the cage would be too small for them. It takes up too much space so we took it out. Will probably look for a much smaller wheel or a small saucer . We also took out the steps That lead up to the loft as it kept falling off even if we snap it in. Our mouse figured out how to climb up the walls to get to her loft.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelle

customer_reviews.title: If you want to lose your hamster buy this
customer_reviews.text: Almost everyone of my hamsters has escaped from this cage at one point. Once they are grown they can easily push the door open or pop off the end caps. Even when I reinforced the end caps they have nearly chewed through it. Ultimately my favorite hamster died because of the poor design on the door. It was a good size for the mom and her babies at first (until she popped the door open) .
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cage and so does Abathur my little ham ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage and so does Abathur my little ham ham. Mr. Abby closed on his beautiful ham hut today it features 1 bedroom an exercise wheel, a food bowl anda ramp. His other ham hut was just too small so when his owners closed on their house he closed on a new house himself. Con's: the water bottle is a joke 1its small and 2 it leaks like crazy so just used the water bottle from his old cage. Update: I’ve had about 8 or 9 of these over the years (I’ve had 10 hamsters) and my last one just passed away. Cages hold up pretty good. I just reccomend you get a better water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for a dwarf hamster!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cages I have ever seen. Currently, it is housing my Robo Dwarf Hamster, Ash, who absolutely loves the cage. The trick to making the wheel quiet is to add olive or sunflower oil to it every 2nd cleaning. The water bottle has enough storage for a good 5 days and the food bowl is very appealing. I keep all the hamsters toys under the bed as there is so much room there. I didn't even have to get my hamster to move to the upstairs bed... He did it himself! Overall, this is a great cage with everything you need; plus you can add-on through either of the 2 tube connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Jake P.

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: the cage its self is cool and functional as long as you add attachments because it is small. the only really bad thing is that the wheel has long slits on the inside that were obviously meant to be there and serve no purpose, the worst thing about it though is that when my hamster runs on it, his feet fall through these slits and he has to stop and im sure it wasn't pleasant. I didn't notice this till he ran on it and then I took it out. so im gonna have to buy him a wheel now but thats ok he has one is the other cage.
customer_reviews.author: Sir-Baphomet

customer_reviews.title: No need to look any further...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One for hamster and one for mouse. They love it. Although I did have an extra wheel at home for my mouse, which was a bit smaller, so I swapped it out for 'Jerry'. The wheel that came with the cage is big enough for my large Siberian hamster. Their upper nest area, (I call the apartment); they love it....their sleeping quarters. Super easy to clean. Couldn't ask for more. Thank you for thinking through the design and usefulness of this cage b4 creating. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JoBo

customer_reviews.title: It's a hassle of a cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my girlfriend as well as a whole setup for a hamster. The door did not latch at first and she had to figure it out. Also, the water tank is way too high for her robo hamster to eat, the wheel is loud and he constantly runs, and the tubes don't exactly fit on the holes. I'm not very happy with the cage and the design but I would've at least thought the water would be accessible to the hamster.
customer_reviews.author: All Outta Bubble Gum

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow but overall nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive cage and it's well made. The only reason I took 1 star away is it is a little small once you put the wheel and feeder in. I actually removed the feeder provided for extra room but this cage is very narrow. I wish it was a little bigger for my hampster to have a little more room. He does love the wheel (and yes it is squeaky with and without vegetable oil) but my son doesn't mind the noise. Overall I wouldn't return and my hampster seems happy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: These are great! We have two
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We have two. Everything needed to make your critter happy all in one box. My only knock would be that the water bottle didn't work very well and we ended up replacing with a better one. For critters that chew, the combination of metal bars and plastic seem to work well at minimizing chew damage. Our mouse loves the loft and spends a lot of time on the wheel. Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hanshew

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for VERY small animals
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cage. It comes with everything you need for a starter kit. I would definitely recommend it for keeping mice. Anything larger will need a bigger home. We used it as an emergency home for 2 baby rats for about two weeks until we could get them a proper setup. This cage is pretty sturdy as long as you don't drop it. When ours fell durring cleaning several of the hard plastic portions cracked or broke.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weekend trips
customer_reviews.text: Despite only having a regular short hair hamster, my little Doodle is quite chubby as well as lengthy, coming to about six inches. I got this as a travel cage for short weekend trips and I absolutely love it. It was easy to put together and feels very secure once everything has been snapped in. It's about half the size of his main cage, which suits him just fine for two or three days. I make sure to bring his run around ball for extra exercise. This would be a wonderful full-time home for a smaller breed of hamster, or a good vacation home for big boys like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top opens easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a while ago The things I like about it is the size accessories and color the wheel is not to loud as our other cages My dislikes which is every important is the top easily pops open My hamster did excape Thankfully we found him another thing is the water bottle is small we refill often We currently still use this cage but we attaches something extra to hold the lid down
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: It's great overall and cute for small mouse.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've ordered. I like these. But this one came without a piece of the roof and there's no way to use without the roof. I emailed the vendor that I was directed to from Amazon page and I never hear anything back. I'll have to return it
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her cage much better than the ones she could find in stores! It came with a food bowl, water bottle and attachment, ladder and upper level and wheel. It came mostly put together so I only really had to add bedding and fill the water and food! It seems to be very sturdy and made well. My other daughter has one bought from a pet store and this one is so much easier to see your pet!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great little cage! Made well.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I bought this for our daughter, she had a class project with mice. It was perfect. She was able to carry her mouse to school in this cage with no worries of it falling apart (high school). That was 2 yrs ago since then shes had 2 more hamsters that have/are using this cage. It has withstood alot of taking apart to clean and has never had an issue putting it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Pros/Cons
customer_reviews.text: Gave a 4 because it is an excellent starter set, but it was a pain in the @ss to put together... Taped all four corners so it all stays together when I take the top off for cleaning. Other than being a huge pain in the @ss to put together, it's actually a pretty good cage for a small hamster and comes with everything a first time owner or beginner would need: water bottler, exercise wheel that works really well, and food dish.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My two little guys (Coffee and Milk) love it! LOL Play like they are crazy in it all the day, and now they all went deep sleep.. Good overall
customer_reviews.author: Dongmao Li

customer_reviews.title: Nice but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and perfect for my hamster. My only complaint is the hamster wheel is so loud. It will rattle and squeak every time"poppy" runs on it and she's a runner. I have to put her in another room with the door shut to get any rest. Update: the wheel is much quieter now and my hampster hasn't escaped. We've added extra tunnels and attachments to it. It's a great cage at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: vegasmom

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: well now i have to change my review because he is now getting out of the cage by hitting it with his head and crawling out. one time he got out he was stuck in the walls all day but we had to put the cage out so when he come out he go in it, which thankfully he did.
customer_reviews.author: Assume Nothing

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for price but wherl came broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the wheel came broken. The part that turns so you can attach it to the side of the cage is completely broken off. It's a nice looking cage and came mostly assembled, but the door doesnt close very well and how it latches doesnt feel super secure to me. Its perfect size for my one mouse and he loves the ladder and hideaway area. It does look cool, but I have to say my other cage feels a bit sturdier. I hope they replace the wheel for us I will update my review after talking to the company.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well put together
customer_reviews.text: This cage has it all! The water bottle is small but that's okay (a good reminder to get your hamster frssh water daily). The loft is a nice place to sleep.The wheel as mentioned is not a quite one but olive oil makes it a little less noisy. It comes almost put together which is nice. No gaps unlike its competitor cages. You'll want to add to this cage though as with most hamsters need a lot of space. Still seeing if I can connect the competitors brand cage to this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters are Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an add on cage as we acquired a second hamster. It came 90% put together. The 10% that wasn’t was very easy to assemble. Attached easily to habitrail tubes. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Langer

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for Hamsters but...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not suitable for a hamster of ANY KIND, that being said, my elderly mouse is very happy in this cage. He is almost 3 years old and doesn't do much but he enjoys the wheel and his little sleeping nook. I would not recommend this cage for anyone unless you have an elderly/sick animal that needs less.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a travel cage for my daughter's hamster. I wish it was slightly bigger, only because we LOVE the cage for regular, everyday use. The hamster can't kick the bedding out of it, it's easy to clean, it's really a great little cage for hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel case not a permanent house for our hamster. It is too small unless you start adding in the tunnels for the hamster to roam around and connect it with another house. Easy to assemble that my ten year old was able to do it on her own. Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, terrible wheel
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage, terrible wheel. I have had several Habitrail cages over the years and like the design of this one best so far. However, I just put the gerbil in yesterday and found it knocked off. Worse, now that I put it back on, it refuses to turn. Adding oil didn't even help. Worse yet, when we put it back on the last time, part of the piece that holds it on the bar broke off. So now I'm stuck buying another wheel.
customer_reviews.author: snickersblk

customer_reviews.title: Escape artist
customer_reviews.text: After three months of a wiggly tube hole, my hamster, nala, decided to forcefully push through the hole, wander out of my closet, out through the bedroom door and in to the laundry room where my nine year old brother saw a tiny pink nose poking out from under the dryer. So I would not recommend unless your hamster is responsible enough to not eat dryer fluff. She is okay now though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stealth after oiling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and my wife finds it easy to clean. The wheel was noisy at first so I took the wheel off and oiled it with vegetable oil as I didn't want to use anything petroleum based. After that, the wheel is silent and has been for a few months. My other daughter has an older cage and we will be purchasing this stealth model in the future. I will give it five stars but considered dropping it to four as they could have checked and oiled the wheel in advance.
customer_reviews.author: SteveC

customer_reviews.title: Great hamster cage
customer_reviews.text: Great little cage for a hamster. Ours loves it and our kids love how easy it is to use. Wish they made the little house part open easily because he loves to hide there and it’s hard to get him out. However it’s still a great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the purchase and price. Our new hamster loves the wheel and the little hideout area (it moved its bedding up there to sleep). I'd recommend this for any with a hamster. The colors are exactly as seen in picture. Updated review: our hamster has managed to escape from the orange locks on the side, and poor thing fell. Those parts could have been made better. Also, does anyone know where i can get a replacement water bottle for this??
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Great product and price. They should charge more for it because it would still be worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've had hamsters for years. I'm on my third pair of dwarf hamsters. You'll need an add on cage though. This cage is too small for two or even one hamster. The more space for them to venture in the better. I use habitrail crystal attached to habitrail ovo. For two dwarfs you also need two food dishes and two wheels (comes with both habitrail cages). The wheels for both cages are quiet. The food dishes are large enough for them to climb into and won't tip over. Ive replaced both cages once for sanitary reasons over a 5 year period. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jaret D

customer_reviews.title: Eye-friendly cage
customer_reviews.text: This has been pretty great, love the immovable wheel for travel, the fact that it's not an ugly multicolored cage like the rest, and that it's held up so far (going on 3 months). The orange latch attached to the front/top door fell off and it never was a secure latch, which is the only downside so far. Our mice have been secure still.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: connect it to other cages
customer_reviews.text: It's fine if you treat it like an ovo and connect it to other cages. I find that I like to use this cage instead of the dome ovos because this provides more space and airflow. This is definitely not a complete habitat for a hamster though and you will need to get 4-5 cages for your hamster to be comfortable. I hate the wheel. It's loud and I'm afraid my hamster's feet will get caught in the openings. I just got him a saucer type wheel and he's fine on it. He loves the tiny room on the deck. Also, I love the water bottle. It doesn't leak and it's cute and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: yicycles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Robo Dwarf hamsters!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage along with two small attachments (OVO Mini Maze and OVO Den) for my two Robo Dwarf hamsters. They loved it and so did I! The clear plastic is much more sophisticated than the primary color cages that are popular in pet stores. It also makes it much easier to see your hams! I was worried that my Robos wouldn't be able to climb the slope to the loft but they did so without a problem. I did replace the wheel with a stand alone one and had to buy a different water bottle that would extend low enough for my hams. Overall, it's a perfect cage that's easy and fun to modify.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but even tiny hammies need more space.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, no issues with quality or anything. However after getting our hamster we learned that it’s too small for even our tiny robo dwarf.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Amos

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 cages for the hamsters to stay while I clean their 40 gal. tanks; I might actually buy more and connect them, since they’re very light weight and pretty to look at. I’m not sure yet, but my wife’s hamster, Bakugo, approves so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Only give it 4 stars because it came with marks on it. I didn't return it due to me having to travel soon. Really easy to clean and the wheel is pretty quiet. Took our hamster a few days to get use to it but now he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin maerz

customer_reviews.title: A few problems
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and very nice looking. It is quite small, which was fine since we had a dwarf hamster, but I think it would be too small for a regular sized hamster. It was very light, which would not be good if you have small children or animals who can knock it over ( my small cat was able to knock this off of my dresser). After a couple weeks the wheel started getting extremely loud, so we bought a different one and replaced it. It is nice that the sides are plastic, therefor eliminating the problem of the hamster kicking out the bedding, however the shallow bottom can make cleaning it out a bit messy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Parsons

customer_reviews.title: ONLY USE AS A TRAVEL CARRIER IF YOUR USING IT ALONE (W/O ANY ATTACHMENTS).
customer_reviews.text: ONLY USE AS A TRAVEL CARRIER IF YOUR USING IT ALONE (W/O ANY ATTACHMENTS). GREAT TRAVEL CARRIER. It is cruel to keep your pet in here for their entire life. Wheel is noisy, just add some coconut oil on the back of the wheel where the stick meets the wheel or any food grade oil as long as it is not toxic to your hamster (pls reasearch first).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage desperate to find a cage that would hold together without spending a lot of money. I guess you get what you pay for. At first, I was super excited. Finally, a simple cage that I didn’t have to spend an hour assembling! That was nice. The ladder that comes with didn’t attach well, I gave up on it and it’s been out of the cage ever since. The hatch that opens the cage loosens easily (having to catch my hamster after she escapes and doing a duct-tape job on the doors). The design is simple and nice, but cheaply executed I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Becerra

customer_reviews.title: The door has to be Jerry rigged to lock.
customer_reviews.text: The door doesn't really close like it should. The wheel is iffy. Covered the midfle long holes so our little guys doesn't get a paw stuck. However, not impressed with the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina L McMurtrey

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed. Mika
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a Russian dwarf hamster. I am a big researcher and eventually decided on this cage because of the majority of high reviews. I am not disappointed. Mika,my hamster, seems to love it and I got a good deal! The majority cages out there, mainly Kaytee brand are cheaply made and too small even with extensions. I find this cage a good fit for me and my hamster. I feel if you are considering this cage I would personally buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Habitrail Cristal Cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage to have something new for a new pet mouse that I got. It's a very pretty cage, a nice amount of room for one mouse. I will say that the base and top could be a lot sturdier in terms of how they connect (and stay connected). Be careful in picking it up, must always be picked up from the base, trust me I learned this the hard way thankfully my mouse wasn't harmed in the chaos. I eventually got a 2nd mouse and found this cage to be a bit cramped for the 2 of them, but it's still a pretty nice cage. easy to clean, item is as advertised. arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: This cage is designed well but poorly made. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is designed well but poorly made. The front latch is difficult to open, the ladder doesn't attach to the upper level correctly and consistently falls down, and I had to tape the orange disks to the holes on the sides of the cage, where you can connect the cage to other habitats, because they don't attach securely and I'm afraid my hamster will escape. The cage is also very tiny compared to other cages you can get for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool cage. I love the color combination and it has everything to keep the littles busy. The water bottle is tiny (but cute). The cage arrived only in its regular box. The cage was cracked & i had to super glue 3 tabs back on. That didn't stop me from ordering another one which arrived in a second box and was undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Miami

customer_reviews.title: It would be good if it was sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart pretty easily. The wheel comes off super easy and trapped the hamster inside. Water bottle also leaks all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Peronto

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cage
customer_reviews.text: i was concerned at first about the design of the cage door. But my hamster is so in love with the little house that the door is not an issue. So I give this product five stars! You can't beat the price and it actually is a great cage for a robo hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lee Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great paired with the OVO studio!
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with the OVO studio and it works together well. Our hammy is a little on the larger side for a teddy bear, but he fits in the wheel just fine. The water bottle doesn't drip, the food bowl is cool and the it came already put together. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a bit small for a mouse
customer_reviews.text: Maybe hamsters require less room but it was a bit small for a mouse. Wheel was huge so I removed it for a smaller version. I bought attachments to create more room and interest and they were cute, but a nightmare to attach.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda poor quality material, east to put together but is very flimsy and can fall apart. The plugs for the tube attachment holes barely stay in. It's truly a wonder how my mice haven't gotten out. But the wheel works well and is pretty stable. All around it's kinda meh. Kinda what you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: My hamster lovers her new home!
customer_reviews.text: I read many review on this cafe before purchasing. Yes, it is small but my little Teddy Bear Hamster feel safe and secure. Of course there is no perfect cage but I’m extremely happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ellarose Pinkus

customer_reviews.title: This thing is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My cage came pre-assembled. All I had to do was set up the little ramp for my hamster to climb, but the water bottle on the cage, and that's that. This thing is easy to clean, provides enough space for my little hamster to run around, and I love the transparent sides! My previous cage had opaque sides and I couldn't even see the hamster in the cage. :( I haven't added any tubes to it yet, but plan to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for a single gerbil.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a travel cage for my gerbil, but she is doing so well in it, i may not put her back in the other cage. In fact, I'm looking to expand it. It is sturdy, the wheel is quiet (and she doesn't chew it), and the water bottle actually works! The latch is secure, too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Just simply the best buy/fast shipping and wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this hamster cage and so does my sun fire dwarf hamster. Thank you so much .... love that that first the cage came mostly put together (time saver) then the shipping was so fast I couldn't even believe it, it's so lightweight and easy pop off bottom to clean (life changer for sure) and lastly the price you couldn't ask for better ...... again thank you from me and simba (my hamster)
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to assemble and take apart Quick cleaning No cracks or breaks when delivered Cons: Too small for my Syrian hamster but I connected two of these cages by tubes - my hamster loves going back and forth! Water bottle caps didn't work for the first couple days but after I messed with them, they worked perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this cage
customer_reviews.text: Years ago when I had my first hamster I had the Habitrail Space Station which similiarly resembles this cage except it was blue! Unfortunately I recently got two hamsters of opposite sex so I had to keep them both separated. One hamster is using the habitrail space station and the other is using this, the habitrail cristal hamster habitat. In addition to each habitrail cages, I added expansion tubes and the habitrail ovo home because the habitrail cage alone is not spacious enough. Overall, I'm happy with this cage. Like others have mentioned, it's very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kiabels

customer_reviews.title: nice cage but the clip will be eaten through quickly
customer_reviews.text: i thought this would be too small for our large hamster but it was great and she loved it tremendously...had several other systems connected for a nice play space. However, she quickly ate through the clip that kept the cage closed which is why i gave it 3 stars - ended up getting an s-clip to keep her in.
customer_reviews.author: Tuggerrum

customer_reviews.title: Door hinges snap off
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage, but the door part broke off after a few months of using it and the hamster escaped so now we need to hold it up with clothes pins
customer_reviews.author: AhhhSarahhh

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks to assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was so hard to put together. And the two side round places. Still feel super loose. Afraid that the hamsters might get out.
customer_reviews.author: alexis maddox

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged (not b/c of delivery)
customer_reviews.text: The product was broken when it arrived - glass cracked, wheel cracked, the white middle piece running horizontally on the top was unlatched and unfixable. Packaging was undamaged so it definitely did not happen during delivery. Looked amazing and would have been a great travel cage for my dwarf, but things were misaligned and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.K

customer_reviews.title: ( I did have very good customer service though considering this was the second cage ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the cage doesn't snap closed to be secure. My hamster has also figured out how to open the door and made the Orange lock fall off. :( I did have very good customer service though considering this was the second cage I had sent to me. The product just wasn't good enough to hold my hamster. On a good note I like the wheel. It was very quiet compared to the previous wheels I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: To be used as a TRAVEL or vacation cage ONLY
customer_reviews.text: This cage is WAY too small for any type of hamster, even dwarfs. The door mechanism broke off as we were getting the cage out of the box. Assuming the door latch works, the best feature is the price at $16-20 but it really can only be used as a temporary cage. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DopeyDuck

customer_reviews.title: Needs Better packaging
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful cage but have not been able to keep and enjoy it because it keeps getting delivered damaged. It needs protection inside the box! Second time replaced and still cracked due to no protection when shipped.
customer_reviews.author: ELSA M

customer_reviews.title: ALREADY BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheaply made. Doesnt snap together right. If you even touch it it feels like it's going to break. The latch is very hard to use. Now the latch is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This cage is only big enough for a Syrian hamster ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is only big enough for a Syrian hamster if you're using it for traveling/short term. It is definitely too small as a full-time habitat for them. I still use it for my Syrian hamster when we go on trips but I had to buy a much bigger cage for home use when she became fully grown.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer1234

product_meta.title: Habitrail Small Animal Cage - for Hamsters and Gerbils
product_meta.description: Style:CristalThe Habitrail Cristal is a hamster habitat that serves as a safe and secure living area for hamsters. Habitrail Cristal is completely compatible with all other Habitrail brand items. The wire cage is constructed of plastic and wiring for both durability and excellent air circulation. A deep base design with rounded corners makes cleaning easy and minimizes mess. A large plastic door allows easy access to your pet and it has a lock to keep your pet securely inside. This durable small animal cage features a complete, unobstructed view of your pet, while providing a safe and comfortable home to keep any hamster and pet owner happy and entertained for hours. Features of the Habitrail Cristal include a large plastic door for easy access, a secure door lock to keep your pet securely inside, a look out deck with ladder, a quiet exercise hamster wheel, a chew- proof hamster water bottle and holder with stainless steel tip, a hamster food bowl and a small animal litter guard. The Habitrail Cristal provides your hamster with a lavish hamster house to live in. Create the ultimate hamster playpen by adding Habitrail hamster cage accessories! Connect the Habitrail Small Animal Tunnels, Small Animal Hideouts, or the Hamster Tubes to the windows of the Habitrail hamster cages and habitats with the Habitrail lock connectors (all items sold separately). This will help you in create the greatest small animal pen for your furry friend! For more fun add the other Habitrail hamster accessories including hamster toys, hamster balls, hamster bedding, hamster chew toys, hamster treats, hamster food, hamster bed, hamster carrier, hamster leash, hamster hammock, hamster supplies, hamster harnesses, and other hamster toys and accessories.
feature_bullets: Durable, safe, and comfortable hamster house
Hamster cage comes with hamster hideout to satisfy a hamster’s natural need to explore and hide
Easy to clean and designed to provide excellent air circulation
Allows easy connection to other Habitrail items, such as the Habitrail Hamster Tunnels, using our patented lock connectors (sold separately)
Hamster habitat measures 16 L x 10 W x 9.5 H inches (40.64 x 25.4 x 24.13 cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
